messages.subject: conversation thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: . I really want to find a place where we fit in a little, where my son can make a friend.Perhaps I m trying too hard. You re in the wrong place I think. I
messages.messageBody:
". I really want to find a place where we fit in a
little, where my son can make a friend.Perhaps I'm trying too hard."

You're in the wrong place I think.
I can tell you from experience, that the differences will just get
deeper and you'll feel more and more out of place. I'm not sure why
that would be a great place to find acceptance for an unschooled child
that has difficulty in social situations.

Does he really feel a need for more social activities? Are you feeling
that it's something good for him or is he asking for more? I would
really look for alternative mommies that schooled, before I looked at
groups of Christian homeschoolers. BTDT...no thanks.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
